#Determination of mu_psi0 and sigma2_psi0
logit_omega_mean<-log ((1-omega_mean)/omega_mean)
scale_level<-function(x){(x-min(x))/(max(x)-min(x))}
levels_dose_level<-scale_level(as.numeric(levels(dose_level)))
llm<-lm(logit_omega_mean~levels_dose_level)
mu_psi0<-llm$coefficients[\(Intercept)\"]
